notes: All entertainment options researched with 2026 availability verified. Shows like Impression West Lake and Tianmen Fox Fairy are seasonal (March-December). Book major performances 1-2 weeks in advance during peak travel periods (April-May holidays). All activities selected for solo female traveler safety - well-lit, tourist-friendly areas with good transportation access. Photography spots include best times verified from multiple sources. Cost estimates in EUR based on 2026 pricing where available. Hong Kong and Macau require separate visa/permits - consult Tsinghua international office before booking.
